itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer (born 1938)

wikipedia_page.main: Alan Henry Morgan Rees (born 17 February 1938) is a Welsh former rugby union and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s. He played representative level rugby union (RU) for Wales, and at club level for Maesteg RFC, as a Fly-half. He played club level rugby league (RL) for Leeds. He also played county cricket for Glamorgan from 1955 to 1971.
